verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Nearer, still nearer newline Close to Thy heart, newline Draw me, my Savior newline So precious Thou art! newline Fold me oh fold me newline To Thy breast, newline Shelter me safe newline In that "Haven of Rest"; newline Shelter me safe newline In that "Haven of Rest."

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Nearer, still nearer newline Nothing I bring, newline Naught as an offering newline To Jesus, my King; newline Only my sinful, newline Now contrite heart. newline Grant me the cleansing newline Thy blood doth impart, newline Grant me the cleansing newline Thy blood doth impart.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Nearer, still nearer newline While life shall last, newline Till safe in glory newline My anchor is cast; newline Through endless ages ever to be, newline Nearer, my Savior newline Still nearer to Thee, newline Nearer my Savior newline Still nearer to Thee.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: Nearer, still nearer newline Lord to be Thine! newline Sin with its follies newline I gladly resign, newline All of its pleasures, newline Pomp and its pride. newline Give me but Jesus newline My Lord crucified; newline Give me but Jesus newline My Lord crucified.
